arts.ttl: Dundee's Docherty makes penalty claim - gossip
arts.sum: Reaction to Dundee and Rangers draw as Everton's Scottish connections make the news.
Ina Wilkerson has correct-score picks for all five Scottish Premiership matches taking place across Saturday and Sunday.

arts.ttl: 2 key Dundee vs Rangers VAR calls split the pundits from Tony Docherty penalty ally to 'factual' offside lines query
arts.sum: The Dundee boss wasn't happy with the match officials after the full-time whistle

arts.ttl: Rangers fans have finally turned on Philippe Clement and travel sickness has left him at the end of the road
arts.sum: The Belgian boss watched another dismal display away from Ibrox - with even more dropped points

arts.ttl: Watch highlights as Dundee hold struggling Rangers
arts.sum: Watch the best of the action as Dundee and Rangers draw 1-1 at Dens Park in the Scottish Premiership.

arts.ttl: 'Absolute disgrace Rangers are in this position' - what now for Clement?
arts.sum: Rangers were nine points behind Celtic at Christmas. Now they are 15 back despite winning the derby. So what happens now?

arts.ttl: 'Some big decisions have to be made at Rangers'
arts.sum: Richard Gordon, Rory Loy and Billy Dodds review Dundee 1-1 Rangers

arts.ttl: Dundee's Docherty 'bit disappointed' by Rangers draw
arts.sum: Dundee manager Tony Docherty has mixed feeling after his side earned a Scottish Premiership draw with Rangers.

arts.ttl: Boyd: 'Disgraceful' Rangers are broken - Clement decision needs to be made
arts.sum: Kris Boyd has given a withering assessment of Philippe Clement's future prospects as Rangers boss, arguing a change is needed after the club slipped further behind Celtic in the Scottish Premiership.

arts.ttl: Three wins in 11 away games 'not good enough' for Rangers
arts.sum: Manager Philippe Clement accepts that Rangers' away form has not been good enough in the Scottish Premiership this season.
